thread.title: The Most Anticipated Fashion Show in Decades Turned Out to Be Brilliant
thread.title_full: The Most Anticipated Fashion Show in Decades Turned Out to Be Brilliant

author: Cathy Horyn
title: The Most Anticipated Fashion Show in Decades Turned Out to Be Brilliant
text: The first clue were the words embossed in leather on the back of the invitation: Calvin Klein Established 1968. Walking down Seventh Avenue this morning to the company’s headquarters on West 39th Street, I thought how deftly the words simultaneously acknowledged the weight of Klein’s achievement, alluded to a watershed... More »
